name: @codebase-mcp/prompt-enhance
description: Prompt enhancement desktop application with web UI

scripts.copy-templates: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (fs.existsSync('src/web/templates')) { fs.cpSync('src/web/templates', 'dist/web/templates', {recursive: true}); console.log('✓ Templates copied to dist/web/templates'); const files = fs.readdirSync('dist/web/templates'); console.log('  Files:', files.join(', ')); } else { console.error('✗ src/web/templates not found'); }"
scripts.package:pkg: npm run build && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --config pkg.config.json --output build/pkg/prompt-enhance-win-x64.exe && npm run copy-prompt-to-build
scripts.copy-prompt-to-build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'prompt'; const dest = 'build/pkg/prompt'; if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file => fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src, file), path.join(dest, file))); console.log('Prompt files copied to build directory')"

author: wmymz <wmymz@icloud.com>
